name: Jpiekarski.github.io
body:
# Welcome As I complete them, I will be linking below to some of the full-stack web apps I've made as a student at the Software Craftsmanship Guild in Akron, Ohio. The tools we use include Java, Spring, MySQL, Tomcat, HTML/CSS and JS. # Project 1: Address Book [Link To Project](http://addressbook-piekarski.rhcloud.com/)
[Source Code](https://github.com/JPiekarski/addressbook)

A simple CRUD application, this project lets a user see the addresses in the book and sort them. It also had an administrator role who can edit the existing addresses and add new addresses to the book.

# Project 2: Triangle App [Source Code](https://github.com/JPiekarski/TriangleApp)

The application was designed to take in three values, either from a user or from a file, and determine what kind of triangle, if any, they formed.

#Project 3: Flooring Order Tracker [Source Code]()
This project was created to demonstrate basic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on a MySQL database. It uses MySQL, Java and the Spring Framework.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
